column1: #text=I was riding my bicycle down a beautiful country road on a sunny , summer day .
#text=When all of a sudden , I felt something was wrong .
#text=I stopped my bike , got off and looked down .
#text=I must have ridden over something sharp to puncture it .
#text=So I pulled out my gear bag that I had strapped to my bike .
#text=I found an extra rubber tire liner and the tools needed to repair it .
#text=I took the wheel off my bike so it would be easier to work on .
#text=I removed the punctured rubber tire liner from the wheel .
#text=I replaced it with the new one using my tools .
#text=I then used a special little cartridge I had brought with me that was filled with pressurized carbon dioxide to pump my new tire up .
#text=Once it was done , I placed it back on my bike and continued on with my ride .
